mean_cn: v. 将日期追溯到过去某时，回溯
mean_en: to write a date on a cheque or other document that is earlier than the actual date
sentence: I asked the telephone company to backdate my incorrect surcharges to last March.
sentence_trans: 我告知电话公司将不实收费时间回溯到三月份（并将多余的钱还给我）。
word_etyma: back回 + date日期 → 日期倒流 → backdate回溯
